name: Dungeon Heart
description:
This is a game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

Since the theme is "An ending is a new beginning", I decided to make this game around replaying the same level in different ways. Each the you die, the level will reload, but its layout of the level is a bit changed, also the traps are random so you will not see the same trap in the same place each time.

Control:

-A, D or Arrow Keys to move left/right

-W to jump
